text:
@Acosta Does Trump and @presssec think the air in the arena is different on the stage than throughout the rest of the arena?
#Coronavirus will be in the air. It will spread widely throughout the arena. Some areas may have a higher concentration, but it will be in the air. #TrumpPlague
